description: The court ruling comes amid criticism of Hungary's coronavirus emergency law.
title: EU court censures Hungary over migrant detentions
title_page: EU court censures Hungary over migrant detentions - BBC News
maintext: "For the past three years I have not been able to love Hungary with all my heart, because I was afraid of the law. But for some time now, with all my heart, I consider Hungary as my own country."
